content: X-HVB Shear connector Shear connector for composite beam constructions ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Economical alternative to stud welding – no expensive equipment required Portable solution which can be moved around the jobsite easily without the need for pulling electric cables Ideal for renovating old buildings where welding on existing cast-iron beams can be problematic Hilti web-based software available to aid optimum design in meeting the load requirements Increased productivity – quick set-up and usable in all weather conditions Applications Holding concrete slabs to steel structures to resist shear forces and increase shear loading capacity in composite structures Can be used on galvanized and painted beams For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Metal deck Material composition: Carbon steel Rm = 295-350 N/m2 Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Technical Data | Application | Metal deck | For use with (tools) | DX 76 | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Approvals | DIBt, SCI, Socotec, TZUS | Base materials | Steel | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 239357 - SHEAR CONNECTOR X-HVB80 - Package Size 250 pc - 348179 - Shear connector X-HVB 95 - Package Size 200 pc - 348180 - Shear connector X-HVB 110 - Package Size 200 pc - 348181 - Shear connector X-HVB 125 - Package Size 125 pc - 348321 - Shear connector X-HVB 140 - Package Size 120 pc
